nodes.text: The OI-CT was a model of crane walker used by the Galactic Empire. They notably saw use on Corellia as early as 13 BBY, and on Mustafar during the construction of Fortress Vader by 12 BBY.

The OI-CT first appeared in the 2018 movie Solo: A Star Wars Story, but was not identified as such until 2019, in a video from the official "Star Wars Kids" Youtube channel. The concept was pitched by James Clyne, design supervisor at Lucasfilm.
